additional_info:
Swimming pool, Storeroom, Wardrobe, Technique, Internet, Telephone, Satellite, Alarm System, Generator, Heating system: gas, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 •	The house is located  in 300 meters from Tbilisi Mall,
•	Land  1972 m²,
•	Building 706 m², including 130 m² basement,
•	The height of the ceiling in the rooms 3.05 meters,
•	Leaving room 49 m²,
•	Cabinet 21 m²,
•	6 bedrooms: 23/28/21/18/19/33 მ²,
•	6 wardrobes, each of about 5 მ²,
•	Dining room-kitchen 42 მ² with Italian furniture and technique + utility room of  5 m² ,
•	4 bathrooms: 6/13/8/5 m²,
•	Laundry room 18 მ² (with balcony of  13 მ²), 
•	3 balconies: 3/13/9 m²,
•	2 French balconies,
•	Veranda 29 მ²,
•	Boiler room 6 მ², 
•	Electricity distribution room 5 მ², 
•	Winter garden 16 მ²,
•	 basement 136 მ²,
•	marani (location for storing wine) 30 მ² with toilet-room and two  pitchers,
•	Garage for two cars 40 m²,
•	The house is totally  coated with 60 mm  Danish rockwool heat isolation,
•	The  roof of the house is build with Marcel type tile, 
•	On the whole perimeter of the yard there is signalization  and watching cameras, 
•	The gate and the garage door is  regulated by panel,
•	On the gate there is an on door speaker-phone,  
•	There is a well  and the dog’s open air-cage of 8 m² in the garden,
•	Irrigation system,
•	Orchard with 3- year 50 plants,
•	Heating water supply system is arranged by collector systems,
•	The house is heated with panel type radiators,
•	Kitchen –dining room is heated by floor heating,
•	There are 5 places foreseen for the conditioners and  three of them are instolled, 
•	The photos of electric and water supply systems while their installation process are archived.
